title: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC2A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC2A model. The model represents a high initial response field-controlled alternator-rectifier excitation system. The alternator main exciter is used with non-controlled rectifiers. The Type AC2A model is similar to that of Type AC1A except for the inclusion of exciter time constant compensation and exciter field current limiting elements.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 6.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcIEEEAC2A

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

kb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second stage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K).  Typical Value = 0.28. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (K).  Typical Value = 0.35. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (K).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

kh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current feedback gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.037. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.012. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -8. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 4.4. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 3.3. Default: 0.0

vfemax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limit reference (V).  Typical Value = 4.4. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = 105. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = -95. Default: 0.0
